name: The Oregon Trail
intro: Head west as a pioneer leader traveling in a covered wagon.

exits.fin:
You went outside to play.


The End

author: CoBinee

__blocks: You could play a game on this old computer if you had all of the floppies...
You've found all the floppy disks!

You whiled away the afternoon on the computer.

The End

__comments: called once on the game, each room, and each tile when all assets are first loaded
called on the game, the current room, and each tile in the current room every time the Player enters a new room
called on the game, the current room, and each tile in the current room every time the Player exits the current room
called on the game, 20 frames per second, before anything else is done that frame (except when a say text box or menu is on screen)
__blocks: THIS PROGRAM SIMULATES A TRIP OVER THE OREGON TRAIL FROM INDEPENDENCE, MISSOURI TO OREGON CITY, OREGON IN 1847.
YOUR FAMILY OF FIVE WILL COVER THE 2040 MILE OREGON TRAIL IN 5-6 MONTHS --- IF YOU MAKE IT ALIVE.
YOU HAD SAVED $900 TO SPEND FOR THE TRIP, AND YOU'VE JUST PAID $200 FOR A WAGON.
YOU WILL NEED TO SPEND THE REST OF YOUR MONEY ON THE FOLLOWING ITEMS:
OXEN - YOU CAN SPEND $200-$300 ON YOUR TEAM THE MORE YOU SPEND, THE FASTER YOU'LL GO BECAUSE YOU'LL HAVE BETTER ANIMALS
FOOD - THE MORE YOU HAVE, THE LESS CHANCE THERE IS OF GETTING SICK
AMMUNITION - $1 BUYS A BELT OF 50 BULLETS YOU WILL NEED BULLETS FOR ATTACKS BY ANIMALS AND BANDITS, AND FOR HUNTING FOOD
CLOTHING - THIS IS ESPECIALLY IMPORTANT FOR THE COLD WEATHER YOU WILL ENCOUNTER WHEN CROSSING THE MOUNTAINS
MISCELLANEOUS SUPPLIES - THIS INCLUDES MEDICINE AND OTHER THINGS YOU WILL NEED FOR SICKNESS AND EMERGENCY REPAIRS
YOU CAN SPEND ALL YOUR MONEY BEFORE YOU START YOUR TRIP - OR YOU CAN SAVE SOME OF YOUR CASH TO SPEND AT FORTS ALONG THE WAY WHEN YOU RUN LOW.
HOWEVER, ITEMS COST MORE AT THE FORTS. YOU CAN ALSO GO HUNTING ALONG THE WAY TO GET MORE FOOD.
WHENEVER YOU HAVE TO USE YOUR TRUSTY RIFLE ALONG THE WAY, YOU WILL BE TOLD TO TYPE IN A WORD (ONE THAT SOUNDS LIKE A GUN SHOT).
THE FASTER YOU TYPE IN THAT WORD AND HIT THE RETURN KEY, THE BETTER LUCK YOU'LL HAVE WITH YOUR GUN.
AT EACH TURN, ALL ITEMS ARE SHOWN IN DOLLAR AMOUNTS EXCEPT BULLETS WHEN ASKED TO ENTER MONEY AMOUNTS, DON'T USE A $.

__blocks: YOU'D BETTER DO SOME HUNTING OR BUY FOOD AND SOON!!!!
DO YOU WANT TO (1) HUNT, OR (2) CONTINUE
TOUGH---YOU NEED MORE BULLETS TO GO HUNTING
DO YOU WANT TO (1) STOP AT THE NEXT FORT, (2) HUNT, OR (3) CONTINUE
TOUGH---YOU NEED MORE BULLETS TO GO HUNTING

__blocks: DUE TO YOUR UNFORTUNATE SITUATION, THERE ARE A FEW FORMALITIES WE MUST GO THROUGH
WOULD YOU LIKE A FANCY FUNERAL?
WOULD YOU LIKE US TO INFORM YOUR NEXT OF KIN?
BUT YOUR AUNT SADIE IN ST. LOUIS IS REALLY WORRIED ABOUT YOU
THAT WILL BE $4.50 FOR THE TELEGRAPH CHARGE.
WE THANK YOU FOR THIS INFORMATION AND WE ARE SORRY YOU DIDN'T MAKE IT TO THE GREAT TERRITORY OF OREGON BETTER LUCK NEXT TIME

SINCERELY

THE OREGON CITY CHAMBER OF COMMERCE

A REAL PIONEER!
PRESIDENT JAMES K. POLK SENDS YOU HIS HEARTIEST CONGRATULATIONS AND WISHES YOU A PROSPEROUS LIFE AHEAD AT YOUR NEW HOME

__blocks:
RIDERS AHEAD.
THEY DON'T LOOK HOSTILE

TACTICS
(1) RUN  (2) ATTACK  (3) CONTINUE  (4) CIRCLE WAGONS
YOU HAVE TO SEE OL' DOC BLANCHARD
YOU RAN OUT OF BULLETS AND GOT MASSACRED BY THE RIDERS
RIDERS WERE FRIENDLY, BUT CHECK FOR POSSIBLE LOSSES

__blocks: WAGON BREAKS DOWN--LOSE TIME AND SUPPLIES FIXING IT
OX INJURES LEG---SLOWS YOU DOWN REST OF TRIP

BACK LUCK---YOUR DAUGHTER BROKE HER ARM
YOU HAD TO STOP AND USE SUPPLIES TO MAKE A SLING
OX WANDERS OFF---SPEND TIME LOOKING FOR IT
YOUR SON GETS LOST---SPEND HALF THE DAY LOOKING FOR HIM
UNSAFE WATER--LOSE TIME LOOKING FOR CLEAN SPRING
COLD WEATHER---BRRRRRRR!---YOU HAVE ENOUGH CLOTHING TO KEEP YOU WARM
COLD WEATHER---BRRRRRRR!---YOU DON'T HAVE ENOUGH CLOTHING TO KEEP YOU WARM
YOU RAN OUT OF BULLETS---THEY GET LOTS OF CASH

QUICKEST DRAW OUTSIDE OF DODGE CITY!!!
YOU GOT 'EM!
YOU GOT SHOT IN THE LEG AND THEY TOOK ONE OF YOUR OXEN
BETTER HAVE A DOC LOOK AT YOUR WOUND
THERE WAS A FIRE IN YOUR WAGON--FOOD AND SUPPLIES DAMAGE!
LOSE YOUR WAY IN HEAVY FOG---TIME IS LOST
YOU KILLED A POISONOUS SNAKE AFTER IT BIT YOU
YOU DIE OF SNAKEBITE SINCE YOU HAVE NO MEDICINE
WAGON GETS SWAMPED FORDING RIVER--LOSE FOOD AND CLOTHES
YOU WERE TOO LOW ON BULLETS--THE WOLVES OVERPOWERED YOU
NICE SHOOTIN' PARTNER---THEY DIDN'T GET MUCH
SLOW ON THE DRAW---THEY GOT AT YOUR FOOD AND CLOTHES
HELPFUL INDIANS SHOW YOU WHERE TO FIND MORE FOOD
SERIOUS ILLNESS---YOU MUST STOP FOR MEDICAL ATTENTION
